Citing ChIMES¶

  • Reference Key for ChIMES Methods
  • Reference Key for ChIMES Parameter Sets
  • Reference Key Definitions

Reference Key for Methods/Applications¶

Key definitions are given below.

Method Reference Key
2+3-body ChIMES
  1. Carbon-1
ChIMES+DFTB
  1. PuH-DFTB
  2. DNTF-DFTB
  3. TiH-DFTB
Iterative Refinement
  1. CO-1
Carbon Condensation
  1. CO-1
2+3+4-body ChIMES
  1. CO-2
Distributed LASSO
  1. CO-2
Active Learning
  1. CO-2
  2. DNTF-1
ChIMES+MSST
  1. HN-1
  2. DNTF-DFTB
  3. DNTF-1

Reference Key for Parameter Sets:¶

Parameter set and key name are interchangeable. Key definitions are given below.

KEY Material Bodiedness T (K)/ \(\rho\) (gcc) Range Comments
Carbon-1 Molten Carbon 2 5000/2.43 N/A
Carbon-1 Molten Carbon 2 5000/2.43 N/A
Carbon-1 Molten Carbon 2+3 5000/2.43 N/A
Carbon-1 Molten Carbon 2+3 6000/2.25-3.00 N/A
Water-1 Water 2+3 298/1.00 N/A
PuH-DFTB Pu/H 2+3 ??? DFTB \(E_{\mathrm{rep}}\) … safe for dynamics?
CO-1 Carbon Monoxide (1:1) 2+3 6500-9350/2.5 N/A
CO-2 Carbon Monoxide (1:1) 2+3+4 2400/1.79 N/A
HN-1 Hydrazoic Acid H/N 2+3+4 300-4500/1-2 N/A
DNTF-DFTB 3,4-bis(4-nitrofurazan-3-yl)furoxan 2+3 300-?/?-? DFTB \(E_{\mathrm{rep}}\)
DNTF-1 DNTF 3,4-bis(4-nitrofurazan-3-yl)furoxan 2+3+4 300-?/?-? N/A
TiH-DFTB Ti/H ??? ??? … safe for dynamics?
